snippet: An appeal to donor countries from the new general manager of the Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria: The fund is a great investment.
abstract: Gabriel Jaramillo, current general manager of the troubled Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria, appeals to finance ministers from participating nations to increase donations, arguing that the fund is fundamentally a good long-term investment.
lead_paragraph: An appeal to donor countries from the new general manager of the Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria: The fund is a great investment.

headline.seo: Global Fund Takes a New Approach to Soliciting Donors
headline.main: Fund-Raising: A New Approach to Solicitations for a Troubled AIDS Charity
